Transcript

In this world, if an 18-year-old awakens a lord's talent, they have the opportunity to enter the battlefield of the myriad races vying for supremacy. The Dragon Sea Kingdom has existed for 5,000 years. Countless powerful humans paved the way for the continuation of their race, paving the way for the struggle for supremacy among all races to give humanity a place to survive in the battlefield of countless races fighting against other races. However, to date, the Dragon Sea Kingdom and even Blue Star are only at the very bottom of the battlefield of the myriad races vying for supremacy. Countless powerful alien races from other star systems also want to devour this ancient and mysterious blue star.

The man has been in this world for 12 years, and today is the day humanity awakens its lordly talent. Lyn Sha, frank talent piece. Next, the middle-aged man beside the testing stone tablet announced indifferently. Lyn Sha silently walked off the stage. The students laughed mockingly.

The top student from Jangdong number three middle school only had an F- level talent. With only an F-rank talent, you'd be nothing more than cannon fodder in the battle of all races. Haha. Peaceful talent reduces monster hostility by 10%. At this moment, a girl with a cold and aloof demeanor stepped out from the crowd.

Lord Talent Test, please remain quiet. She looked at Lyn Sha as he approached and said softly, "Leave the rest to me." Lyn Shia nodded and watched her walk toward the testing stone tablet. "Ladies and gentlemen, I am Chu Yui, the city lord of Jangdong City. Today, you have completed the Lord talent test and are ready to enter the battlefield of the war of all races." On the other side of the enormous portal in the plaza, radiance shone brightly. Chu Yusi dressed in a suit stood there.

In 5 minutes, the battlefield for the struggle for supremacy among all races would begin. On the battlefield, there will be death and injury, but glory and achievement await you. May your future be bright, and may the dragon sa kingdom prosper. Long live humanity. With a chorus of shouts, the portal suddenly opened and blazing light shone down.

Lynn Sha felt a sudden brightness before his eyes and his body involuntarily entered a bizarre and fantastical time space passage. A few seconds later, a cold voice sounded in my ear. Biometric verification successful. Lord's identity confirmed. Welcome to the battlefield of the myriad races.

You are in the Lon region. You have arrived in your territory and gained 10 minutes of invincibility. Before he could finish speaking, Lyn Sha found himself surrounded by desolation. Beneath his feet lay hard ground, and in the distance stood the Lord's mansion, a level zero structure. The surrounding area consisted of simple buildings and logging camps.

The territory was enclosed by a wooden fence, and the outside world was blurred under the shroud of light. Lord's talent confirmed. The voice of the supreme god continued to ring out. Talent confirmed. SSS level talent.

Eternal peace. Lyn Sha saw the SSS level talent displayed on the panel eternal peace. He had never seen such a talent before. He quickly sat down cross-legged, the tattoo on his wrist flashing, and then issued the command. Open personal panel.

He continued examining the SSS level talent and discovered that it was upgradable. The talent was divided into five parts. Heaven and earth stand firm. Increases the spiritual energy concentration of the territory by five times and the probability of sudden events by five times.

life and destiny increases crop output speed and mineral extraction speed by five times. Continuing the lost learning of the sages increases learning speed by five times allows unlimited learning of any skill and enables the teaching of others. Eternal Peace increases building construction upgrade and production speed by 100% and increases city defense system defense by 100%. Peace for all ages. Conflict increases troop, divine beast, and hero attributes by 20%, loyalty by 20%, troop production by 100% and allows access to the divine perspective.

This talent is simply unparalleled, especially the establishing the heart of heaven and earth and continuing the lost learning of the sages, which shocked Lyn Sha. Immediately Lynn Shao realized the mysterious token in his mind that had transported him to this world. He hurriedly checked it and the system issued a notification. Unknown item detected in player. You have obtained one Hasha token.

Hasha token. Unknown level item bound. Upgradeable. Current progress 1%. Function summoning of China.

Consumes energy to summon Chinese troops, mythical beasts, heroes, and buildings of the highest quality. Energy 1/1. Function: Heroic Spirit Possession summons the heroic spirit of a Chinese emperor to possess you, granting you imperial abilities for 24 hours. Energy 1/1. Function: Ascension: Consumes energy to ascend any item, skill, unit, or hero to the highest level.

Energy 1/1. 5 minutes have passed. His invincibility is about to end and his territory is facing a monster threat. Recruit troops immediately. Lyn Sha took out a recruitment talisman.

Recruitment talisman. Quality. Common. Function description. Recruit 10 soldiers of common quality per team.

Ordinary recruitment tokens can generally only summon militia whose combat power is relatively weak. Although there are other advanced runes, Lyn Sha can only use this ordinary recruitment token for now before entering the battlefield of the myriad races. All lords talents will be revealed within 24 hours, and many wealthy lords will prepare highlevel items for their descendants. If you are unprepared, the main god will give you three items of the lowest quality: recruitment token, leader token, and heroes token. Lyn Sha made up his mind.

He used Hasha summoning, consuming one unit of energy to summon a unique Hasha troop. With a wave of Lin Xiaos hand, the ordinary recruitment talisman transformed into a golden talisman in the bright light, interwoven with auspicious clouds and mythical beast patterns. A portal appeared. 10 figures emerged, each clad in fishcale armor and wielding a 3meter long weapon, the blade of which was fitted with a sharp double-edged sword. These soldiers had resolute faces and cold expressions.

Lyn Sha noticed that they seemed slightly puzzled when they first arrived. The leader approached Lin Shiao and knelt on one knee. "Your subordinate, Tanggi, greets your lordship." The other nine echoed in unison, "Greetings, your lordship. No need for formalities, please rise. Lynn Shiao waved his hand, then began to observe their attribute panels.

Lyn Shao said self-deprecatingly. In this way, I'll be more like a true wandering lord. Ranger lords are lords who fight for supremacy among all races by relying on their powerful military strength. Unlike other lords who focus on territory development, they invest all their resources in improving themselves. When Lyn Xiao's talent awakened, it was at the F rank.

His friends all advised him to take the path of a wanderer. After all, the lord's talent was too weak, and he had no background. The epic treasure chest.

Open the epic chest. You have opened an epic chest and obtained an epic special equipment. Forest witch's cloak. Click to view epic level special equipment. Lynhos heart skipped a beat.

Special equipment generally requires epic or legendary quality to appear. It's impossible for it to be of low quality. Lyn Shao quickly recalled the contents of the knowledge base. Moreover, special equipment has unique abilities or attributes. Look at the stats of this forest witch's cloak.

A magnificent crimson cloak floated down from the sky and landed lightly in Lin Xiao's hands. Forest witch's cloak. Special quality orange epic. Attributes. Base defense value 365.

This meant that once worn, unless the opponent possessed a gold legendary level ability, they would be unable to break through it. But what puzzled him was the meaning of the exclusively for women attribute. He looked at himself, then at Tang Yi standing not far away, that rough, burly man whose fists could kill an ox. Song Ruer led his men to their feet, their eyes fixed on the Lord with curiosity and respect. Lyn Sha also sized up the newly summoned soldiers.

The 10 men were clad in heavy iron armor, had burly builds, carried crossbows on their backs, and wielded horizontal swords. They were clearly a squad of archers. Lyn Sha breathed a sigh of relief. It turned out that these archers were the real ranged units. I already know your capabilities. return to the team and fight alongside me later. Song Ruer and the others immediately knelt down.

He has five spiritual fields of exceptional quality. The earlier they are planted, the earlier they will be harvested, thus solving the problem of food. The output and maturity time of his spirit fields are stronger than those of legendary fields. This SSS level talent is just too strong. These are not monsters, but demons. The demonic tide is more threatening than the beast tide. Demons are more chaotic and bloodthirsty than beastmen, orcs, and demons. Lynsha was a little confused. Demonic tides usually only occur after the Lord's mansion is upgraded.

He had just started upgrading, so how could he have encountered a demonic tide? Judging from the numbers, there are at least several hundred monsters in the demon tide. A guard with a long-handled sword patrolled outside the fence. Seeing the black tide approaching, he raised his weapon to prepare to fight. bows. And Song Rui shouted, "Stretch!" They stepped on the crossbow heads to tighten the bow strings. Knock the arrows. Your unit, the archer song Ruer, has killed the swollen drowning one, gaining 800 experience, 10 energy, and 15 gold. Your unit, the archer song Rome, has killed the swollen drowning man and obtained swelling drowners. Lyn Sha recognized these monsters. They were indeed a demonic tide.

The swollen drowners are monsters formed from the long-term decay of abandoned corpses. They typically inhabit areas near water sources, poisoning creatures or dragging passers by into the water to drown. They are of rare strength and do not generate demonic mist on their own, but will join a demonic tide if swept up in it. Lyn Sha confirmed that this was a demonic tide and knew that there must be even stronger demons hidden within it. The demonic tide continued to advance towards the Lord's Manor.

Lin Shiao, Tangg Yi, and the others quickened their pace, preparing to join forces with the Mo Dao Iron Guards to resist this wave of demonic tide. The archers fired a second volley of arrows. So fast, Lyn Shao was surprised to see that the archers had knocked the bows and fired in a volley in just a few seconds. He turned his head and saw that the archers no longer needed to step on the bow string with their feet, but instead used one hand to quickly draw the bow, string the bow, and knock the arrow in one smooth motion. In a short time, the archers fired 30 arrows and 30 demons fell to the ground.

When Lin Shiao and the iron guards of the Mod Dao arrived at the front of the demonic tide, the demons attack had slowed down and the fog had gradually dissipated. skills, low tier magic immunity, critical strike. These rock golems are tireless, enormous, and powerful, and novice lords usually don't provoke them easily. Phantom shooter level 10, quality excellent attributes: strength 25, spirit 30, constitution 18, soul 15. Combat power 26 stars. Skills: rapid fire, long range sniping.

Phantom archers are powerful ranged units in the early game. Although their defense is relatively weak, they have a long range, high accuracy, and strong attack power. Lyn Sha looked at the 16 muscular men in the group, shook his head slightly, and sighed inwardly. This style is really fierce. Chapter 17.

Subduing the Phantom Archer. Dealing with these phantom shooters is not difficult at all. The ammo dao iron guards and divine arm archers were both clad in armor weighing dozens of kilograms. Legendary level troops wouldn't be easily defeated by these superior level troops. Lyn Shiao could have the Mod Dao iron guards charge in and kill them outright or have the divine arm archers use their long range skill to kite them from 500 m away.

But Lyn Xiao's real purpose was to subdue these phantom archers because this was the phantom archers lair in the battlefield of the myriad races. After defeating the guards and occupying the nest, a certain number of corresponding creatures will spawn each week. In other words, after Lyn Sha occupies this nest, he can recruit a certain number of phantom archers every week. There should be 35 of these phantom archers.

Lyn Sha thought to himself after capturing the lair, I can recruit seven more each week. He knew his luck was exceptional. The lord's manner hadn't even finished upgrading when he encountered the beast tide and the demon tide. If the manor were fully upgraded, he might face an even stronger demon tide. More manpower meant more strength.

Lin Xiao's frank talent, peace, took effect, reducing the hostility of all hostile monsters by 10%. A handsome blonde archer stepped forward. Stranger lord, you have invaded our territory. You had better give us a good reason. Gene Dang smiled coldly. Location accurately locates the position of a lord within the same region whose level difference is no more than 10 levels. Can be used once every 24 hours. Has no attack power, but is indispensable in faction wars. Xiao Datong nodded.

Since Lin Shiao is so weak, yet he possesses treasures. A dangerous glint flashed in his eyes. We even have teleportation talismans and a bounty order, plus the ability to locate his coordinates. Add to that our four rare unit squads and a necronomicanin that can summon 40 undead warriors. Why not just do it directly? He made a throat slitting gesture, his intentions clear.

It will both seize Lin Xiao's things and quickly establish our authority. Does Shang, are you in or not? Jin Dang remains silent for a moment before finally making up his mind. Let's do it. Fortune favors the bold. And what danger is Lin Sha compared to that? I'll go back and prepare and bring the harpies with me.

Let's wipe him out together and let everyone in the newbie zone know how powerful we are. As darkness fell, Lyn Sha unleashed a powerful strike, piercing through the head of a demonic creature resembling a seductive woman with his spear. The creature let out a sharp scream and exploded into pieces. Your lordship is mighty. The iron guards behind him, seeing Lin Xiaos heroic figure, all shouted.

The long-eared elf saw the Lin was also shocked and he was glad that he had joined Linhao's side. The Lord is so powerful. He easily dealt with our phantom archers all by himself. It seems my choice was right. With a flash of purple light, the female demon dropped a purple superior treasure chest.

Another treasure chest. It seems the main god wants me to open more blind boxes. Lyn Sha picked up the treasure chest and the flashing lights stored it in the system warehouse. The monsters had been wiped out. Lyn Shao turned around and saw a group of admiring gazes.

Lord, you are mighty. Tang Yu was the first to step forward, kneeling on one knee and clasping his hands and greeting. Did the Lord have such a pinchant for it? Lyn Xiaoso's lips twitched slightly as he watched the two burly men's performance, feeling utterly helpless. "What does it mean to be concerned about the world and to eliminate demons and protect the righteous path? What does it mean to save countless men in the world?" he asked casually. "Exactly," Tanggi immediately explained. "The Lord has been frowning from the very beginning, knowing that there are female demons causing trouble, and he is worried. The crowd shouted in unison. Solderings eyes widened and he suddenly realized that he had wronged Lyn Sha and his heart was filled with respect for him.

Lyn Sha looked at the scene before him, his head throbbing with pain. Nighttime is extremely dangerous on the battlefield of the myriad races. Except in areas controlled by lords, most wild monsters become stronger at night, and powerful demonic creatures appear frequently. Lyn Sha knew that nighttime was the domain of wild monsters, and lords would return to their territories in advance to avoid danger. He suspected that this situation was a setting made by the main god system to repair or manipulate certain mechanisms. Coupled with his strange luck, Lyn Sha worried that he might encounter something even more terrifying that night.

But now that you've killed enough monsters, collected enough gold, experience, and energy, and recruited 42 exceptional phantom archers, the mission is complete. Those who only think about making more money are no different from the Walking Dead. Money shouldn't be a college student's dream. The walls are higher and wider with greater defensive capabilities. Highle walls are even city walls where people and horses can walk and ride, making them impenetrable to ordinary monsters. Lyn Sha with his innate talent directly reduced construction time by 50% and the wall could be completed in half an hour. The timing is perfect. Sword Saint Payman. Sword St. Pman. As the voice of the main god system faded, a figure emerged from the portal. This is a man dressed in ancient Chinese attire.

He is wearing a pure white brocade robe with a tiger pattern gold belt around his waist. He has long, neat hair tied back. Below his eyebrows are bright eyes and he has a slender figure. He is truly a man of extraordinary talent and elegance. The man had a three-ft long sword hanging diagonally at his waist.

Although he was young, his expression revealed a hint of vicissitude, and every move he made was that of a swordsman. He stepped out of the portal, casually glanced around, and looked relaxed and indifferent, seemingly not at all puzzled by being in an unfamiliar place. At this moment, the god system began to instill information into the man. The man tilted his head and received all the information in a moment. So, it's another world, a battlefield with endless wars and countless worlds and races.

Very well, this will allow me to hone my swordsmanship and pursue a higher level. After muttering a few words to himself, the man turned his head and looked at the lord Lin Sha, who was surrounded by dozens of emo dao iron guards and divine arm archers standing in front of him. Lyn Sha also stared silently at the man in ancient costume not far away. Heroes like knights errant, swordsmen, and chivalous thieves are unruly and more powerful in combat, but they are often too unrestrained and have lower loyalty than other heroes, requiring more maintenance of the relationship between lord and hero. Lynn Shiao recalled the relevant knowledge of the paper on the management of male heroes and the taming of female heroes mistaken and involuntarily connected it with the sword saint and knight in front of him.

In his previous life, Lyn Shao had vaguely heard of the name Pay Min. He only knew that Pay Min was one of the three perfections of the Tang Dynasty. Pay Min sword dance was as famous as Lee Ba's poetry and Jang Sus cursive script. He had been awarded a title by the emperor of the time which showed his strength. But chivalry can break the law with martial arts.

The more powerful the chivalous hero, the more unrestrained and free they are. You are my lord. At this moment, Pay Min spoke, his voice gentle and refined yet seemingly casual. Looking at the carefree man before him, Lyn Xiaos serious face slowly relaxed, and he gave Pay Min a kind smile. Exactly.

Welcome, young swordsman from China. Welcome to be my subject, my first hero. Payman saw Linn Sha admit that he was the lord. He paused for two seconds and stared straight at the tall young man in front of him. He stopped his nonchalon attitude and quickly stepped forward, knelt on one knee, and bowed in greeting.

I am Pay Min, the 31st generation descendant of the Pi family of Hadong. I pay my respects to the Lord and am willing to serve you. Lynn Sha, who had already mentally prepared himself, stood there dumbfounded. This swordsman isn't as arrogant as I imagined. Please rise, Mr.

Pay Min. Lyn Sha reached out to help him. I dare not address you as sir. You flatter me. My lord, you may simply call me by my name, Pay Min.

Pay Min stood up. He looked at his lord, Lin Sha, and his casual and chivalous aura disappeared, replaced by a more respectful one. Lin Shao also silently watched Pay Min thinking to himself, "Check Pay Min's personal attributes." The main god system immediately displayed Pay Min's attributes. Sword Saint Pay Min Chinese quality golden legend level one. Attributes: Strength 58 + 29.

At level two, he would definitely be stronger than Tang Yi and Song Ruer, who are both at level seven. Lyn Shao had already used most of his experience points to level up, raising himself to level 10 in one go. After reaching level 10, the experience points required for level 11 even exceeded the total of the previous 10 levels. Moreover, Lyn Sha possessed the spirit of a Chinese emperor who could protect him probably. But Lyn Sha wasn't sure if it was always a top expert like Xiang Yu.

Lyn Sha will not upgrade himself in the short term. So, he will focus on upgrading his subordinates. Now that we're in this strange world, are you willing to follow me to achieve great things and live up to the name of chivalry?" Pay Min smiled faintly and said,"Lord, you are protected by the Emo Dao soldiers of our great Tang dynasty, and you are the rightful heir of the Lee family, the emperor of the Tang Dynasty.

Although you have a chivalous spirit, you were also a soldier in your previous life, serving as a general in our great Tang dynasty." Pay Min knelt down on one knee again and bowed, saying, "Isn't it only natural for a young man to serve as Lord? I, Pay Min, am willing to serve you like a dog or a horse. Ding! Your hero, Sword Saint Payman, has reached 80% loyalty, as easy as a fingertip. The system notification sounded at just the right moment. "Good, good, please rise." Lyn Xiaos doubts were finally resolved. It turned out that Pay Min was not only a swordsman and a sword saint, but also a soldier of the Tang Dynasty.

No wonder he chose to obey orders first in front of the Lord. Just as Lin Sha was about to give Pay Min a gift to help him unleash even greater power, several system voices came at the same time. The voice of the God system stopped, but Lin Xiao's heart was filled with turbulent waves. He had actually made history on Earth. An S ranked demonic tide is unheard of in the newbie zone. It's only occasionally encountered by top players in the official zones at specific stages. But although it's an S rank magic tide, it's fortunate that it's activated based on the lord's overall strength.

Just as Lin Sha was in a brief mental vacuum, the fighting near the territory naturally did not stop. Call out. The sound of air being torn apart came from nearby, and the archers unleashed their first volley. The tin-headed bone demon and the fierce demon immediately fell dead. Meanwhile, the Phantom Archer had already drawn his bow, ready to fire at any moment.

These two powerful ranged archers only targeted enemies of superior quality or higher, ignoring the most numerous demon children and horned demons. Because those weak but numerous enemies are reserved for the iron guards of the Mod Dao, when the demonic tide reached a distance of 200 m, the Phantom Archer fired his arrow. Swish, swish, swish. The Phantom Archers dominance among elite units is inseparable from their rapid fire ability. These elves arrows are fast and accurate, even faster than the divine archers.

The divine arm bow for long range shooting. They need to step on the bow to draw it, firing one arrow every 3 seconds. When they enter the normal firing range for rapid fire, they can simply pull back the giant crossbow with their hands, achieving one arrow per second. But that's not enough. The Phantom Archer can fire two arrows per second.

The incredibly fast soldering can fire three arrows per second. This is also the type of soldier that Lynn Shiao decided to go to great lengths to recruit. The phantom archer's rate of fire effectively compensates for the divine archer's weakness. If S Ruer and his men were like Barrett rifles, incredibly powerful and capable of point-to-point demolition, but requiring them to pull the bolt after each shot, then Solin and his men were like fully automatic rifles, and very accurate ones at that. The Phantom Archer's first arrow pierced the monster.

The second arrow was already flying in midair, and the third arrow was already knocked in the Phantom Archer's hand. This extremely high rate of fire is best suited for dealing with large numbers of fragile enemies. And so ghouls, bloated drowners, and horned demons fell in droves. However, the demonic tide was like a stream blocked by pebbles. Although it kept creating waves, the demons still rushed to the front of the territory.

Standing before the monsters were 10 burly men, tall and strong, clad in heavy armor, and wielding long swords. The MO DAO Iron Guard S skill has been activated. Pillar of strength. When facing a superior enemy with a combat strength rating close to or exceeding that of your own, increases morale and strength, spirit, and constitution. The greater the number of enemies, the more morale, strength, and constitution are increased.

This effect is doubled when protecting your lord and heroes. Faced with a large number of powerful demons and nightmare horses whose strength was comparable to his own on paper, the Mod Dao Iron Guard immediately pushed his pillar of strength skill to its limit. Increases three-dimensional strength, spirit, and body attributes by 100% and doubles the protection for the lord, increasing strength, spirit, and body attributes by 200%. Heroic: The iron guards of the mo down never retreat. The more enemies there are, the stronger there will becomes.

Activated when the number of enemies exceeds five times the number of iron guards of the Mod Dao, increasing health by 5% and so on up to a maximum increase of 100% of maximum health. The life value of the MO DAO iron body is also directly increased by 100%. The current MO DAO iron guard are as follows. Strength 83 + 166 + 42. Spirit 39 + 78 + 19.

Constitution 72 + 144 + 36. Soul 34 + 68 + 12. In the battlefield where all races v for supremacy, health points are a hidden attribute linked to physical strength and are generally not visible. Such a health value is more realistic because even the most powerful creature will die if it is hit in a vital spot or its head is cut off. Even with tens of thousands of health points, several rounds of reinforcements, the MO Dao iron guards with their two layers of iron armor are truly tanky.

With a howl, the monster charged. With a single slash, Tangi cleaved seven or eight demonic children into pieces. Then with a swift strike, another slash was unleashed in milliseconds, instantly killing more than a dozen demon children and ghouls. All the demons within a 3meter radius were wiped out. All the MO Dao iron guards stood shoulderto-shoulder like a dam against a raging torrent, blocking all the monsters before them.

Whether the monsters were common, fine, rare, or exceptional quality, from level one to level 20, none could withstand a single strike from the Mod Dao. The mist of the silent night had been dispelled by the meteor shower, and moonlight shone down. The sky was ablaze with fire light, illuminating the endless tide of demons. Amidst the demonic tide, a sword light, sharp and unstoppable, crisscrossed with sword energy, illuminating the demonic tide. Before the demonic tide, a wall of people stood proudly, advancing like a wall.

One by one, rare and exceptional monsters were targeted and killed by the divine archer, while fine and rare monsters were slain by a hail of arrows from the phantom archer. This demonic tide, which had terrified most of the novice lords to the point of silence, was actually stopped by Lyn Sha and his heroes and troops. Lyn Sha had experienced a day of intense battles yesterday. Today is the day when most lords will begin what they will all go through. Farming. Chapter 42. The escape of the white stocking Lolita.

Lynn Shao excelled in his studies at school and being a Chinese person from Earth in his previous life. He was naturally skilled in farming, possessing a grade C farming skill that increased the production speed of all his territories by 10%. The talent eternal peace further grants life and destiny, increases crop output by five times and accelerates crop maturation by five times. Peace increases the extraction speed of all resources and mineral veins by five times and increases the construction, upgrade, and production speed of all buildings by 100%. Therefore, the speed of farming and construction can be described as extremely fast.

The territory now has five excellent spirit fields, which mature every 9.6 hours, yielding 2,000 units of spirit rice each time they mature. It's roughly equivalent to maturing every 10 hours with a yield of 2,000 gene per mu. This yield, which was the level of rice yield per moo that Lyn Xiao's most respected grandfather had worked hard for his whole life to achieve on Earth in his previous life, is actually more than two harvests a day on the battlefield of the myriad races. However, the battlefield of the myriad races cannot be judged by common sense. Apart from ordinary and elite troops being similar to ordinary people, rare and above troops have a significantly increased food consumption.

As for epic and legendary troops, because they are too powerful, their consumption is exceptionally high. Moreover, there are countless enormous beasts such as codto beasts, minotaurs, behemoths, cyclops, hydras, and dragons. It is quite normal for a behemoth or dragon to eat hundreds or thousands of kilograms in one meal. The grains grown are stored in the main god systems warehouse and will not be damaged or expire. In the later stages, the number of troops in the Lord's mansion is as vast as the sea with thousands or tens of thousands of soldiers fighting each other at any time.

It can be said that no matter how much you grow, you can accumulate it. This also gave rise to many lords skilled in farming on the battlefield of the myriad races who continuously farmed in the rear of the main battlefield to supply the military merit lords on the front lines. Lynhiao's current five excellent spirit fields if they were normal excellent spirit fields would not be enough to deal with his current two heroes, 62 types of troops, and 30 peasants. Fortunately, Lyn Xiaou's talent was strong enough that the output of his excellent spirit field was comparable to that of a legendary spirit field. Moreover, when killing monsters, he also made sure to keep the edible monster meat, such as lava giant lizard meat and barbarian beef.

He had kept quite a lot of these in his warehouse. We still need to accumulate more spirit fields in the future. After all, the Chinese soldiers are humanoid, so their consumption is only normally high. But if we want to lead the Chinese soldiers to become king and dominate, we must increase their numbers. The Mod Dao iron guards and the divine arm archers are all legion units.

Large-scale legion battles are the best way to showcase their combat power. Luckily, we have this pond. We can replenish some of our food supplies and start using it. Lyn Sha took out an epic quality pond. Pond quality epic.

Output 200 1,000 units. Default output spirit fish which can be caught and farmed with other habitable creatures. Time 96 19.2 hours. Special effect one. When consumed randomly increases one of the following attributes by one point.

Strength spirit body or soul. This effect can only be applied once every 24 hours. Special effect two. When consumed, there is a very small chance to increase the user's skill level up to a maximum of B level. Upgrade requirements too complicated to list.

Of 10,000 races is, as the name suggests, a pond. This pond can raise fish, other aquatic creatures, and even some amphibious units. You need a pond to recruit them. The pond is supposed to house spirit fish, but they're actually just ordinary spirit grass carp. Fortunately, there's plenty of them, so you can eat your fill.

But once the pond reaches the epic level, its nature changes. The resulting spirit infused grass carb even come with two special effects. The first is that it can randomly increase one of the four stats by one point once a day. The second special effect can enhance a user's skill level. For example, if Lynn Shiao eats the spirit fish, there is a certain probability that he will upgrade his mixed martial arts level D, all weapon mastery level D, all troop type command level D, and farming level C to the highest level B.

Of course, under normal circumstances, this probability is extremely small. But under the influence of Lin Xiao's eternal peace fortune, this probability has become small. If you eat it every day, over time you'll eventually see an improvement. Moreover, eating spirit fish can increase one of the four dimensions every day. Lyn Shia took out the pond structure, which was just a white ball of light.

He handed it to the rare farmer he had summoned. Build a pond. Ding. Your farmer is building a pond. Pond under construction.

Construction countdown. 47 hours 59 minutes and 59 seconds. Click to pause. The pond, which originally took 4 days to build, was shortened to 2 days, which made Lin Shia nod with satisfaction. With an epic level pond, any one of these epic quality spirit fish can fetch an astronomical price at the auction house just because it randomly adds one point to attributes and enhances skills.

But before I am strong enough, I can't let anyone find out. I'll enjoy it with my subordinates for now. This pond is a wonderful thing. Epic level pawns are rare, even in the official Lon region, and there may only be a few dozen in the Hasha domain, which are firmly held by powerful families. While the hardworking farmers were building the pond, Lynn Shiao called over another farmer and left the blacksmith shop for him to build.

Of the myriad races, apart from many buildings that can be built instantly, all other buildings require farmers to construct them. However, buildings that are dropped no longer require resources to construct. This is a design feature. Blacksmith shop quality average required. Blacksmith farmer.

Function. Repair and maintain farm implements and weapons. Replenish consumables such as arrows and javelins. Produce ordinary level weapons and armor. A simple basic blacksmith shop.

If there are no blacksmiths, farmers can even be asked to act as blacksmiths, but they can only perform the bare minimum of their functions. Blacksmith shops don't have a production speed because they require blacksmiths to work alongside farmers. The more people working on blacksmithing, the faster the blacksmith shops output will be. At this stage, the main function of the blacksmith shop is to replenish the arrows of the phantom archers and the divine archers to replenish the kitchen knives of the peasants and to serve as a prerequisite building for the tier three base. Even if I upgrade the blacksmith shop to the legendary level, it won't be of much use because it won't be able to play its full role until there are blacksmith masters joining.

Let's build it first. It doesn't require resources anyway. We can upgrade it later. Ding. Your farmer is building a blacksmith shop.

Blacksmith shop under construction. Construction countdown. 23 hours 59 minutes and 59 seconds. Click to pause. After setting down the two buildings, Lyn Shia checked the requirements for upgrading his Lord's Manor to level two.

Lord's mansion level one. Quality legendary. Defense 5,000 + 5,000 plus 2,000 for the walls. Upgrade requirements. Prerequisite buildings.

Farmhouse quality average output ordinary quality farmers. Time recruit one or two per day every half day. Click to start recruitment.

Resources consumed. 50 units of food are required as a recruitment fee for each farmer and the lord will bear the subsequent living expenses. Explanation: When the Lord attacks, there is a 0.1% chance to deal 100 times the damage to the enemy, but it must hit to take effect.

It ignores magic immunity, defense reduction, and shields. Note, critical strike potions, other lords critical strike auras, critical strike skills, and critical strike equipment bonuses only apply to normal critical strikes and do not apply to critical strikes from graceful liberation. So Lynn Shiao, the big boss, had even remembered such a rule.

Breakthrough zone conquest newbie zone. To prevent overly evil newbie lords from wreaking havoc in the newbie zone and causing irreversible damage, the god system has established a rule that allows official server lords to enter the newbie zone and engage in raids after paying a certain price. At any given time, only one person can participate in a raid against a particular newbie lord. Due to the limitations of the underlying rules, the lord level in the official server will be suppressed to the highest level that can be accommodated in the newbie area, which is level 30. In the official server, a lord can only bring a maximum of three heroes, and the hero level is also suppressed to level 30.

In the official server, lords can only use skills, equipment, items, etc. that are available in the beginner zone. The official servers lord will arrive in the new server, which will take 10 days. In the official server, lords cannot build structures in the newbie zone and will return immediately after completing a raid. The maximum number of troops a lord can bring in the official server.

1,000 people. Chapter 55. A complete inventory of all resources. Lynn Shiao had long since memorized all the rules big and small of the battlefield of the myriad races vying for supremacy. After Chufunga reminded him and he realized that Xiao Desang and Gene Datong were mortal enemies with him, he had deduced the worst possible outcome.

It means that skilled players from the official server have broken into the game and are coming to attack me. The highest level for the lord's mansion in the beginner area is level three, which corresponds to level 30 for the lord, the hero, and all wild monsters. When a normal person recruits one hero, the other party will at most bring three level 30 heroes. 1,000 troops, enough to deal with 10 mo Iron Guards, 10 divine arm archers, and 42 phantom archers. But no matter how many regions you conquer, it will still take 10 days.

These 10 days are enough for me to get a lot done. Tier one allows you to build farmhouses and recruit farmers. Tier 2 allows you to build barracks and recruit your existing troops. You can also build hero specific buildings and equip your hero with their own unique troops. With just three books, you can build stables to produce war horses and barracks can produce cavalry.

Resources. We need a lot of resources to produce these units with the bonuses from eternal peace. peace 100% increase in construction upgrade and production speed of all buildings plus 100 defense of all city defense systems and eternal peace conflict 20% increase in attributes and abilities of all troop types divine beasts and heroes plus 20% increase in loyalty of all troop types divine beasts and heroes plus 100% increase in troop production you can quickly produce troops but you will need more resources Besides the difference in the number of troop types, the difference in the level of one's own side is also a big problem. This also requires a huge amount of experience. In short, the solution to this problem is to overcome force with force, leaving no room for shortcuts.

In previous years, there have been countless cases of novice lords being attacked and subjugated by established lords, with very few novice lords emerging victorious. But those who did win invariably became powerful overlords or formidable villains. I entered the battlefield with the goal of becoming number one in the newbie zone, then entering the official zone and even the dragon summer domain and blue star realm to achieve great things. How can I be afraid and lose my edge just because some petty people are blocking my way? Therefore, Lynn Xiaos choice to confront the invasion head-on can be seen as a testament to the backbone of the Chinese people he has cultivated in both his previous lives. First, resources.

Second, experience. These are the things I need most urgently. Lyn Sha thought to himself, "In my memory palace, I have only occupied less than onetenth of the resources in my entire Calabash mountain range. Hi, Tu Shan by Chian and Chun Ningming are all my neighbors. Taking them as vassal lords can not only protect my territory, provide early warnings, and ensure safety, but also help me occupy and exploit resources.

As for experience, go all out and grind monsters. No need to overthink it. Let's get started. Lyn Shia immediately opened his resource panel and carefully reviewed all his resources. Having survived the S level demonic tide and having sent out heroes and troops to kill monsters and then killed Xiao Datang and Gene Dang, gaining some spoils of war, his resources are now vastly different from what they used to be.

Lords all resources panel experience 9,654,100, nearly 2 million from the Demon Tide settlement, plus several million experience from the Demon Tide itself. Gold coins 139,864. But upon seeing the skill description, Lin Xiao's face darkened again. Black god of slaughter. When the lord and his troops/h heroes use poison, the toxicity is increased by 100% and the recipe for the S-level poison, the poison of the machine, is obtained.

Candle shadow and axe sound increases all attributes by 50% in dark environments and at night, limited to the lord only. Increases hatred towards relatives by 50% due to its high degree of disguise. The loyalty of all subordinate troops and heroes with a loyalty of less than 80 is temporarily increased to 80. Gallong River Chariot God increases speed and range of any animal-drawn vehicle, horse carriage, donkey cart, ox cart, etc. by 100%.

Negative impact. Zia Guangi is ignorant of military affairs. All troop and hero leadership values decrease and all troop/hero attributes under his command decrease by 10%. Reading is beneficial. Increases the learning ability of the lord and all his/heroes by 20%, memory by 20% and affinity for books by 20%.

The leader of the shadowy figures said with a smile, "It's no use if you don't listen because you are Chinese and you are ultimately on our side." Lyn Sha nodded.

I'd like to hear the details. With a wave of his hand, the leader of the shadowy figures vanished instantly along with three other figures. An endless sea of lava. Fiery lava spewed forth. Boiling steam filled the air, and a narrow, treacherous path stretched from the depths of darkness all the way to the center of the sea of lava.

There is a small island there. This small island stands alone amidst the lava, like a tiny, fragile boat on the waves. A stunningly beautiful succubus lay listlessly on a large bed in the palace at the center of the island. Beside her was an equally beautiful succubus who was peeling grapes one by one with her delicate hands and feeding them to her. Things are starting to get interesting.

The succubus swallowed the grape, tilted her long neck back and stretched. Master, has that man already met with the ancient demon? The magical mark I left has been activated. The ancient demon has already met him. The succubus lying on the bed was elegantly relaxed and simply said, "How impatient master, what race are the ancient demons? They once dominated all the heavens and myriad realms. Even we were once subjugated and trembled at their feet. Then they were betrayed by humanity. Betrayed by the very people they were protecting, utterly destroyed. Even history was erased and names became taboo just like us.

Chapter 68. The traitor's historical shielding plan. Lynn Shiao and the three shadowy figures arrived at the elucory buildings and pavilions and entered a magnificent overlapping hall. Please sit down, you Chinese from another world. The shadowy leader and Lynn Shiao took their seats and began to slowly recount the story of the Chinese people in this world.

It turns out that the Chinese civilization on Earth and the Chinese civilization on blue planet are no different. They both started with the three sovereigns and five emperors and both had Chin Sher Huang, Emperor Wu of Han, Emperor Taong of Tang and Emperor Taizu of Song. Even their experiences were the same. However, during theQing dynasty, Emperor Guangshu was not poisoned by Empress Daajard Sishi for some reason, but instead regained power after her death. Then, less than 10 years later, the main god system arrived.

On that day, the entire planet Earth seemed to plummet into the heavens, rising higher and higher until it plunged headlong into a different universe. Then all the nations and all the humans on the entire planet Earth who had awakened the Lord's talent joined this endless battle that had been going on for countless millennia. As they continuously entered the battlefield of all races and fought against alien races and peoples, the world order was constantly changing. Gradually, those countries that were already powerful and those with real abilities became outstanding. Taking this opportunity, China also broke free from the poverty and weakness of the lateqing dynasty, shook off the Eisenjoro clan and established itself as the Chinese nation with a completely new organizational form of the battlefield of all races.

Finally, a human alliance was formed on Earth, led by many powerful nations such as China, Japan, Korea, India, Nanua, the British Empire, the Holy Roman Empire, Russia, the United States, and the Arab world. Together, they fought for supremacy against other races and species from all over the world in the battlefield of the myriad races. The human race of Blue Star entered the battlefield of all races more than 7,000 years ago. Lynn Sha nodded. After encountering the god system, this world on Earth not only failed to develop technology, but its technology even regressed because the rules of magic altered certain physical rules. Technology could no longer work. Instead, powerful lordly talents and supernatural powers run rampant. Even the fiercest and most ferocious demons were shocked by the Mo Dao Iron Guards fearless and relentless fighting style, which was almost always critical hits.

They were hit even if they blocked the attack, and they were hit even if they didn't. The ambush was greatly reduced in effectiveness. The divine archer, calm, and giant killer are about to follow up. Composure unaffected by ambushes or mental fear effects. When the enemy is less than 10 meters away from the archer, the archer's strength and constitution attributes increase by 30% and melee ability increases by 30%.

Giant slayer. The divine archer was all a giant of their time. Facing any creature larger than themselves, they possessed unique techniques to deliver critical hits. critical hit rate increased by 50% when attacking giants and the chance to hit a vital point increased by 50%. The fierce demon and the nest demon are enormous demons.

So when the demons plan to launch a ranged attack, the archers with their giant crossbows fired deadly bolts at the demons vital organs such as their eyes, mouths, ears, hearts, and genitals. But when the demons charged toward the archers, they were not met with panicked archers who fled in terror, but with incomparably sharp ring pommel swords. The demons suddenly realized that these ranged attackers were no less capable in melee combat than the armored warriors wielding giant swords next to them. Use Hasha summoning to consume the energy of the myriad races battlefield and summoned the Hashia exclusive unit, the white-shaped spearman. Chapter 80.

The bloodthirsty White Spear soldiers make their debut. Recruitment tokens were originally only used to summon troops of a certain level. One recruitment token could summon 10 troops. If you have two recruitment tokens, last time you recruited human armored infantry, the next time you might recruit elven archers, both are rare unit types, but you can't just recruit whichever you want. immediately used the Hasha token to upgrade the few recruitment tokens in his hand and summoned the Hashia golden legendary troops because he knew that his strength was not strong enough.

If he summoned six or seven different Chinese troops, each with 10 people, he would not know how to use them and would not be able to bring out the maximum ability of each type of troop. Not to mention, he would waste the recruitment tokens for no reason and lose the advantage of making the Chinese troops fight in large groups. 10 Mod Dao iron guards are already very strong, but 1,000 MOA iron guards are even more invincible. Fortunately, the ancient demon told him the trick. Similar to recruiting heroes under certain conditions in China, summoned units can also be summoned by designation.

In the simplest case, when a lord has a certain type of unit, or when the lord's hero has a unit that is exclusive to a certain type of unit, the lord can directly consume more energy to perform a targeted summon, summoning a unit of the same type. As Linhao's voice fell, the two recruitment tokens rose directly into the sky, eventually becoming golden talismans engraved with auspicious five-ccoled clouds and adorned with mythical beast patterns at the bottom. The portal roared, and two groups of figures emerged from it. This group of people all carried 4 m long white shafted spears, had heavy swords hanging at their waists, wore iron-faced breastplates, and had two muscular arms exposed, exuding a murderous aura. They weren't as tall and muscular as the Emo Dao iron guards or the divine arm archers, who were nearly 2 m tall, but they were still tough men over 1.8 meters tall.

Their skin was dark and some of their facial features and eye color differed slightly from those of the Hanchinese. They were actually an army composed of a mixture of ethnic minorities and Hanchinese. The white-clad soldiers armor did not cover their entire bodies, only their upper bodies and shoulders. In addition to the wounded white spear soldiers, the uninjured soldiers nearby who also possess blood lust will enjoy a 30% bonus to all three attributes until the end of the battle.

In a berserk state, the White Spear Spearman enters a fearless state, becoming unaffected by mind magic and unafraid of pain and reaching maximum attack speed. Click to view hidden content. At this moment, the two were inseparable. Chapter 97. the invaders in the peaceful valley. In the valley of Calabash, the fog of war drifted and lingered, a vast expanse of white mist.

This place is filled with bird song and fragrant flowers. And everywhere you look is pristine natural scenery. Here you'll find tall trees, rugged boulders, winding paths, and flowing streams. In the center of the valley, there is a vast, lush green grassland. This place is home to a wide variety of species which is truly breathtaking.

Green goblins who love and cherish human women and often appear in various harmonious novels and comics. There are strong and sturdy centaur raiders who also frequently appear in hentai comics serving as the leaders of a certain section. There are pacifists orc smashers who only occasionally kill humans who invade their homes to protect their layers. They love to eat eggs. There are also bandits and thugs who live in harmony with nature and roam the forest year round.

They are quite rare as human monsters. There are also bloodthirsty witches with eerie and beautiful appearances who enjoy relieving men's worries and often forcibly relax the muscles of young men. In short, this place is home to a wide variety of creatures and species, boasts abundant resources, and has a beautiful environment. It is truly a paradise on earth and a haven for wild animals. Of the myriad races lived happily in this gourd valley, enjoying a life of mutual fighting and constant turmoil.

Until this day, the iron hoves of the shameless invaders shattered the already chaotic lives of all the monsters. It is accurate to the smallest detail without the slightest error. However, the sandbox is not updated in real time. One of which is shadow jump, which allows them to jump from one shadow to another within a certain range to launch a surprise attack.

The other is block. If a ranged unit attacked by the shadow lurker at close range continues to use ranged weapons, the shadow lurker will have a 100% critical hit rate against it. Song Rui turned his head, exchanged a glance with Tang Yi, and said, "It looks like they're targeting weak- ranged units like us." Tang Yi laughed heartily. "Everyone knows that Guster the Archer is just as fragile as the Phantom Archer when the fight starts. Be careful not to twist your fist or crack your hand," Song Rui said in a deep voice.

"I almost couldn't put away the 40 m long broadsword." Lynn Sha continued, "The troops that went after Chufinga were the famous British long bowman. I remember memorizing the world's number one, the number one range when I was in school. This epic unit was the one with the longest range." Lyn Shaide, every long bowman on the sun never sets begins training at the age of 13, and only the most outstanding ones can go to the battlefield at the age of 20. They can draw a 2meter long bow with a maximum range of 300 m and can penetrate most armor on the battlefield of all races. These long bowmen are famous throughout the world.

While most archers can only shoot about 100 m, the long bow is like a sniper rifle, both long range and accurate. Even flying a kite can kill most of the enemies. The downside is the common weakness of ranged units. Weak in melee combat and moderate movement speed. Everyone fell silent for a moment.

Song Rui and Tang Yi exchanged a glance, but Saul Lin was nowhere to be seen. Pay Min stubbornly asked, "My lord, what is a sniper rifle? A shooting device capable of hitting targets at a range of at least 1,000 m." Song Ruer, whose only visible feature was his eyes beneath the iron helmet, gasped for breath, while O Yzi, who had been dozing nearby, snapped his eyes open instantly. Blood frenzy. When a unit bleeds, it triggers a berserk state. immediately increase strength, spirit, and constitution by 30% lasting until the end of the battle.

Furthermore, as injuries worsen, the berserk state bonus will continue to increase up to a maximum of 100% increase for all three attributes. Heroic, the iron guards of the mo down never retreat. The more enemies they face, the stronger their will becomes. when the number of enemies exceeds five times the number of MO DAO iron guards increasing maximum health by 5% and so on up to a maximum increase of 100% of maximum health. The life value of the MO DAO Ironclad increases by nearly 80%.

Pillar of strength when facing a superior enemy with a combat strength rating close to or exceeding that of your own increases morale and strength, spirit and constitution. The greater the number of enemies, the more morale, strength, and constitution are increased. This effect is doubled when protecting your lord and heroes. Facing an enemy force more than 10 times the size of the Modo Dao Iron Guards, the Mod Dao iron guard's attributes increased by 100%. Because of protecting Lin Sha, the Mod Dao iron guards additional attributes increased by 200%.

First, the divine valor skill greatly increases the HP of the Mod Dao ironclad, allowing it to withstand more damage. Dinglay showed Lynn Shia his talent introduction interface and at the same time his aura visibly weakened. My current talent effect is about to disappear and my death is imminent. If you really have a way to make me stronger, then watch now.

Lynn Shiao didn't look up, but quietly looked at Ding Lays talent introduction. Although the description given by the god system was very literary, Lyn Sha still summarized it in the simplest plain language. You can become stronger just by showing off. Successfully showing off increases four main attributes: health, attack power, critical hit rate, and defense. The more impressive the display, the higher the bonus and the longer the duration.

If you successfully show off all the time, some attributes can even get a permanent boost. Moreover, for certain types of showing off, it seems that as long as people are still spreading the story and being shocked by it, the effect of showing off will last forever. No wonder Ding Lelay had to boast about his A-level talent as soon as he entered the battlefield of 10,000 races. It turns out that boasting really does make him stronger. No wonder he always kept a straight face.

He wanted to maintain his image. No wonder he streamed himself when he challenged the death knight. It seems the only way is to act swiftly and eliminate him beforehand to avoid getting burned. The stunningly beautiful woman spoke, her eyes never leaving the old man in front of her. Khalil Jabbrron's expression remained calm as he slowly spoke. I don't think so. I have great confidence in my prophecy.

It says that Lin Sha will be the top wandering night lord in the future of Lang Shia, fighting for Lia and seizing a glimmer of hope for Lia's future. As for the ancient demons, they are nothing but rats hiding in the shadows. Apart from their fallen ancient civilizations and the wealth they left behind, they pose no threat whatsoever. Now, Lynn Shiao is connected to the ancient demons, but he only obtained an ancient divine sword made by the ancient demons. I am confident that I am the only one in the world who can recognize the crimson sky sword.

The stunningly beautiful woman narrowed her eyes. So you mean this matter is known only to heaven, earth, you and me. As long as we don't tell anyone, no one will know. Jabbron lowered his voice slightly. Lord of the domain, when I was young, I was also a wandering knight errant.

I like to use sharp knives, even though there is a risk of cutting my hands. Lynn Shiao has gained the support of the ancient demons, which shows that he has unlimited potential. However, he is still very weak at the moment. We can continue to monitor him, win him over, and absorb him. You're even more radical than Shu Yusi.

Aren't you afraid of asking a tiger for its skin by doing this? We have no choice, Lord. If we continue to lose, the Dragon Sa Kingdom will become a second rate nation within 50 years, and the Dragon Sea domain will be annexed by the Eastern Inmain. Faced with the fate of my nation, I am willing to take the risk. Besides, the prophecy has supported my judgment. Is that so? Upon hearing the news that the dragon kingdom was deteriorating, the beautiful woman's side again.

Khalil Jibron calmly replied, using a few smaller problems to cover up the real big problems.

You mean the demons? Exactly. Lyn Xiao's problem right now is that he is too powerful for a novice lord. And this power is suspicious. If Lin Sha really has an unclear relationship with the demon race, then his power can be explained. We just need to give some official responses that are neither here nor there.

give Lynn Shiao some overt support and declare that Lin Shiao has no connection with the demon race. That way, other countries won't be able to cause trouble in the shadows. The rumors of Lin Xiao's collusion with the demons will not disappear, and the rumors will continue to spread, but at least his relationship with the ancient demons has been covered up. I'll also contact Lin Sha myself and meet with him. Then I shall take my leave. Long after Jabbrron left, a cold, quiet voice sounded softly. They are willing to fight for any chance of survival. Khalil Jabbron, my first prophet, truly values Lynn Shiao. His views on the ancient demons also surprised me. Meanwhile, Khalil Jabbron, back at his residence, also sighed.

He smiled and shook his head, then poured himself a glass of wine. It's really tiring to play riddles with the domain lord. She also knows the truth about the ancient demons. And I also know the truth about the ancient demons. But she doesn't know that I know.

And I know that she knows. We can't talk about this taboo topic, and we have to find a respectable reason to resolve Linhao's matter perfectly. Khalil Jabbron slowly poured the wine into his mouth, looking out the window into the distance. I don't like playing riddles. Lynn Shiao shook his head with a smile and asked Pay Min.

After saying that, Pay Min pointed to the chopping board in front of him, on which were neatly arranged the items he had mentioned. Lyn Sha picked up the sword and glanced at it briefly. Sword in the stone, epic weapon. Attributes: Base attack power 530, strength plus 25, constitution plus 25. Description: Only the king can pull the sword from the solid stone.

The sword in the stone was King Arthur s sword and it provided a bonus to cavalry when worn. The sword in the stone has average stats typical of epic swords. It is worth noting that the sword in the stone also has a trump card skill summon sword spirit. Just as black flame said once the sword spirit appears it will slaughter for miles around and only return after drinking enough blood. It seems that black flame was killed before he could even take it. Only one card remains. This card has intricate patterns and details along its edges, making it more exquisite than even the finest tarot cards. The entire card is like a work of art, depicting a stunningly beautiful angel. Lynn Sha picked up the card and the information given by the main god naturally entered his mind.

Mythical card angel. The holder of this card will gain the authority to recruit the mythical unit angel. Chapter 131. Ba is indeed suspicious. A mythical level card.

Does the holder of this card gain the authority to recruit angels? Does that mean recruiting angels requires this prerequisite? Also, are angels a mythical quality unit? How come black flame has this on him? A series of questions popped into Lin Xiao's mind. In the school curriculum, the highest quality is golden legend. There has never been any mythical quality. But the mysterious and powerful angels can occasionally be heard in rumors on the streets and alleys, and sometimes they also appear in classic western battles, playing a decisive role. Lynn Sha once asked his course teacher what quality an angel was, but the result was a sigh from the gray-haired teacher and the meaningful words.

Anyway, it's not on the exam, so don't know too much. Now, a brand new and beautiful card is placed in front of him, and in an instant, Liao's question of many years was answered. rewards. In the battlefield where all races v for supremacy, all equipment and all troop types have six well-known quality levels: common, fine, rare, excellent, epic, and legendary. You may have wondered the lord talent has six levels F, F, C, D, A, B, and C. F level corresponds to ordinary.

The powerful A level can correspond to legendary, but there are a very few geniuses with S-level lord talent. Does S level also correspond to golden legend? Mythical quality is the best in all realms. The third shadowy figure continued to explain, "The angel cards were jointly produced by the traitorous nations of Western Europe. They monopolized the recruitment authority for angel units. Without their consent, no one can obtain the qualification to recruit angel units or even have the chance to see an angel.

In order to make the best use of the angel's mystery, powerful attraction, and deterrent effect, the behind-the-scenes controllers of Western Europe have come up with a vicious method. They will implant some kind of magical mark that will soon dissipate on their most powerful legendary and epic units, with only a tiny bit attached to each unit. When a legendary or epic unit is defeated, a magical mark will be triggered. However, the small amount of magical mark will dissipate quickly and nothing will happen. Only when the rate of death is fast enough, the number of deaths is large enough and the deaths are rapid, numerous, and dense can these magical marks be gathered together.

When more and more magical symbols converge and reach a critical value, they can trigger the magic they have set up in advance, which will directly send a mythical card from their base. "Do you know why they did this?" Mark the genius, Lyn Sha said in a deep voice. "That's right," the leader of the shadowy figures nodded. "Being able to kill a large number of specific gold legendary units or even more specific epic units in a short period of time can only mean one thing. The killer has very strong strength and can be considered a peerless genius.

In fact, the last time cards were given out in the entire Dragon summer domain was 20 years ago, which is enough to show how difficult it is to meet the conditions. Once the conditions are met, the Western European domain will give out a mythic quality card as loot for the killer. When a normal person encounters such a good thing as a windfall, of course, they would activate the card immediately. Then they will be marked by the magical effects on the cards and watched by the person behind the scenes. Lyn Shao continued in a deep voice.

If this genius is someone the people behind the scenes are willing to cultivate and who is also willing to join them, he will be given special attention. Each official district will have a small number of city states and a largest city which is the central city.

The lords in the formal districts are scattered in various places which makes it easier to acquire resources and develop their power. However, they also have the need for social interaction and communication. For some important resources, face-to-face negotiations are also easier to complete. So, the central city came into being. Lon central city has stood in Lan district for thousands of years.

This ancient citystate, a battlefield of countless races, covers an area comparable to the mega cities Lin Shiao had seen in his previous life, such as Beijing, Shanghai, Guangho, Shenzhen, New York, and Tokyo. It is incredibly prosperous and has everything one could need. There are no Lord's territories in Lan City, only residential and commercial buildings. Therefore, many lords chose to place their territories near Long Nan City for easy access to the city. However, due to historical reasons, the land surrounding Lan City has long been divided up, and only powerful families and leaders of large organizations have the opportunity to place their territories around Lan City.

Within Lon City, except in designated areas, any act that harms others is prohibited. This is an authority granted to each central city by the main god system. Only in this way can a basic peace be maintained in the world of the battlefield of 10,000 races where the strong become stronger. The knowledge he had learned in class echoed in his mind and Lin Xiaos divine perspective had already briefly swept over the entire Lan city. Lan city after entering the official district, you need to go there to report.

Lynn Shiao continued to shift his perspective, searching across the vast land. Lynn Shiao didn't consider locations that were too close to Lan City. However, he also didn't want to settle in any of the remote corners of the LN region. Many uninhabited areas while possessing abundant resources and treasures are also hiding places for lawless elements and outlaws like the Celestial People Organization. After a short while, Lin Sha found a secluded place with abundant mineral resources, also located in the mountains and hills.

After entering the official area, apart from major battles, I mainly rely on teleportation portals to get in and out. This is fine in the mountainous and hilly areas, and it can also hide my calabash mountain range. Golden legendary quality spirit rice and golden legendary quality spirit fish can randomly increase one of the following attributes by two points. strength, spirit, constitution, or soul.

It can improve the user's skill level up to a maximum of B-grade. Most importantly, it has a chance to extend the user's lifespan and maintain a youthful appearance. The legendary golden rice and fish that are impossible to obtain outside are now readily available to all heroes and troops under Lyn Xiao's command, and there's an increasing supply of them. I had the phantom archers take the golden legendary farmers and set up several points in the valley. They provided four meals a day, breakfast, lunch, dinner, and a midnight snack, directly distributing spirit rice porridge. It was a place shrouded in black mist, hidden among towering mountains. The land was rotten and the ground emitted a foul stench. Even the trees and vegetation there were withered and decaying. That place is a forbidden zone for the dead. In the beginner zone, apart from the book of the dead and a few necromancy skills, novice lords will basically cannot encounter the undead race.

This is because the undead race has all come to the official zone and they have banded together to form a unique undead forbidden zone. The forbidden lands of the dead are scattered throughout the various regions of the official district, varying in size. Some are almost comparable to a large citystate, while others are no smaller than the territory of a powerful lord in the official district. It can be said that every forbidden zone of the undead is one of the toughest nuts to crack in the official zone. There are all sorts of undead units and monsters there, including skeletons, zombies, vampires, ghosts, liches, horror knights, and stitch butchers.

The larger undead forbidden zones even have legendary golden monsters like the rotten spider mother and the undead reaper, and even frost dragons of unknown quality. Each undead forbidden zone is guarded by an undead hero. So, why would the lords of the official districts attack the undead forbidden zone? First, the experience points are very high. Second, there are generous material rewards. However, many people's main goal is still the undead orb.

With this item, you no longer need to manually upgrade your heroes and units all the time. Instead, they will upgrade automatically, making it a true hands-free wonder. They will appear from different places from time to time and after a period of time they may suddenly disappear. You say, "I'm despicable for using poison, but wasn't it despicable of you to kill my soldiers with poison shurikens?" Lynhos face had never been so furious before. His handsome features were distorted with rage. He said coldly. Do you know that my troops have never suffered any losses? To deal with you, an 85th level ninja lord.

They have fought bravely and relentlessly, ready to die for you. They can only see the mistakes of others, but not their own crimes. They have small courtesy, but no sense of righteousness. Level 43 versus Level 85, and not just any level 85. Lyn Sha had already checked as soon as he returned. Fuma Codoro was a well-known ninja in Japan, the founder of the Fuma school and one of the four great ninjas of Japan. This is a top tier ninja lord, possessing countless magical artifacts, secret techniques, and extremely rich combat experience. In order to keep him in the dark and prevent his location from being exposed, Lin Sha mobilized his entire army and used every means at his disposal, all under Wong Ming's scheme.

First, there's Baoi, Lin Ziao's current partner and lover, whom he has to personally intervene with. Of the necromancer orb, the mythical level Baoi was over level 40 with all her attributes higher than Pay Mins. But she was, after all, a weak woman with absolutely no combat experience. Ba's mythical skill, peerless demoness, allows her to influence fate. She can amplify, shrink, and transfer the effects of specific skills.

Skills that are too powerful cannot be manipulated. So after she put on the forest witch's cloak, her concealment and invisibility skills reached Srank and even Fumodoro couldn't find her. She followed Fumako closely, using her skills to expose him, attracting monsters to gang up on him and depleting his stamina and endurance. The two groups work hard to dig and set traps, creating the second layer of obstacles for Fumakoto. Then there are the flower fairies. These free-spirited daredevils are skilled in using poison, but their poison is basically ineffective against ninjas who are experts in using poison.

Not to mention the level difference of more than 40 levels. Yellow stones indicate monster spawn points with levels between 50 and 60, while red stones indicate monster spawn points with levels between 60 and 70. Wongming pondered for a moment and said, "The troop type chosen for this level requires careful consideration from our lord." Chapter 177, summoning special forces, outwitting the Chinese order.

Indeed, the combat segment of the martial arts arena was a considerable challenge for Lin Sha. Lyn Sha possesses numerous legendary golden units from China, each with top tier strength, but none of them are truly well-rounded. There are the Iron Guards of the Mod Dao, armored brutes with maximum attack, defense, and health. One strike from them can shatter both men and horses. However, the iron guards of the Mod Dao cannot fight on horseback and have no ranged abilities.

The divine archer boasts incredible defense and a maximum range of 500 me. They are also formidable in close combat rivaling legendary melee units. However, the divine archer is not a cavalry unit and lacks speed and agility. White spear spearmen are powerful attackers with long spears and great swords. They also carry bows and can use ranged weapons as secondary weapons.

Their ranged abilities are comparable to epic archers. They are also a mobile unit that thrives in the mountains. However, White Spear spearman cannot ride horses and their defense is somewhat lacking. The Guan Ning iron cavalry as a cavalry unit was quite well-rounded, possessing ranged and melee combat skills, proficient in musketss, bows and arrows, spears, shortsords, and horseback riding. However, the Guan Ning iron cavalry could not fight on foot, which was a weakness, and their defense was not as good as that of the heavy infantry emo dao iron guards and shimi archers.

If the battle area is relatively small, the cavalry will be unable to maneuver effectively. Lynn Sha shook his head. There was also the great Han Champion cavalry here and after referred to as the champion cavalry. This was an exclusive cavalry unit recruited by Hoitzubing. They were good at long distance raids, extremely fast, and their bows and horse equipment were superb.

They were the ace of field battles, but similarly, their defense was not enough. They were only considered top level light cavalry. They also had no way to use their strength in small battlefields. The ranger, Payman's exclusive unit, is indeed very strong. In a one-on-one battle, no one among his legendary units can defeat it.

Lynn Shiao even suspects that the rangers attributes are close to those of a mythical unit. However, the recruitment speed for rangers is too slow and the current number is still too small, only a dozen or so. A dozen or so rangers would take turns attacking and each of them would experience combat intensity 10 times that of a normal soldier. Secondly, the range class is somewhat lacking in both ranged ability and defense and may encounter kiting tactics. This is a martial arts arena where both sides will fight to the death against Japan, not a friendly one-on-one sparring match.

Lynn Shiao and Wong Ming both agreed that the selection of troops should be as full as possible. After all, this is a battle between nations, and Japan will definitely take it very seriously. As a long-established superpower, the types of troops they produce should have a great many of epic and legendary quality. Furthermore, in accordance with their style of killing their own lords for the sake of resource competition, the participating troops were to be a mix of ranged, melee, physical, magical, cavalry, and assassin units along with a number of suicide units. As long as we discover that Lia has powerful troops, we can use suicidal troops to deplete Lias troops, and victory will be a piece of cake.

After much deliberation, Lyn Sha realized that none of his current unit types seemed capable of reliably winning the match from the very beginning through a series of battles. You have to understand that on the battlefield, every soldier's every move is magnified infinitely. If a soldier turns to run away, how do you know if he is luring the enemy or if he is really running away? One person lures the enemy while the rest actually run. If even one person escapes, it will trigger a chain reaction potentially leading to the complete defeat of the army. Therefore, military discipline is paramount. Anyone who runs away will be killed.

But the white armored Bayera could ignore this rule. Individuals, scattered groups, and collectives could all run away. Next up, the assassin by Ja Bayer used up almost all of his consumable items to set traps and consumable weapons to intercept assassins, annihilating the enemy army. Only 41 enemy soldiers remained before Baija Bayer could even retrieve his steel rod. The next battle began. Next up, the archer. The white armored Bayer charged again, annihilating the enemy army.

However, in this battle, the epic archers of the Eastern Kingdom shot only at the horses, sacrificing their own lives for their horses lives, killing almost all of them. Next up, swordsmen and shieldmen. White armored Bayer can only engage in close combat with swords and shields. The expressions of the people from Lsha Kingdom grew increasingly solemn and worried.

Even though the remaining white armored barbarians could barely lift their hands and their faces were covered in blood from their eyes. Even though their white armor was no longer visible and had been completely replaced by red and black.
