All the lords participating in the competition have taken their positions accompanied by the heroes they are preparing to fight. Similar to the battle, it starts with an elimination tournament.

The main god system selects people to engage in one-on-one duels, and the loser is eliminated. Unlike the battle system, the lord cannot choose the order of appearance. It is all determined by the main god system. After the top 16 are determined by both sides or if one side has too many eliminated players and has fewer than eight heroes left, the group stage will begin directly. The final battle ends when all heroes on one side are defeated or killed.

Heroes are not a unit type and it is difficult to replace them once they are lost. Therefore, there is an additional option for the lord to decide whether to concede defeat for the hero. In order to prevent the hero death rate from being as terrifying as that of combat troops, aside from the lord surrendering voluntarily, the only other options are the hero dying in battle or the god system determining that the hero has lost all ability to resist and voluntarily stopping the fight. Nevertheless, in the past, nearly half of the duels on the martial arts arena still resulted in a death rate because killing an enemy and counter killing often happened in an instant and even lords could not react in time. As the Japanese lord's eyes darted around, deep in thought, he saw Pay Min slightly. That's about it. I've reviewed the basic sword techniques again, and I should have made further progress. Basic sword techniques? You've been fighting me with basic sword techniques the whole time.

The greatest truths are the simplest. I must review the lessons I've missed in order to reach my peak performance. Pay Min replied calmly. Thank you for your sparring, but you're useless now. Jimmy Kamiya Ichiro's eyes.

Was the whiteclad hero about to unleash his ultimate move? Is it that dazzling flowing technique? He roused himself and focused his attention on defense only to see Pay Min still attacking with basic sword techniques move by move. Thankfully, it's just a basic sword. Before the Japanese lord could even utter a sound, pay casually thrust his sword through a gap in Jinme Kamiya Ichiro s defenses, piercing his body. Jinmi Kamiya Ichiro is killed in action. The battle is over.

The hero in white has won in 3 minutes and 45 seconds. The viewers in the live stream also noticed Pay Min's victory. Defeating an epic level hero at this time should have been a decent achievement, but the words were left unsaid. But everyone understood what followed. This speed is still far from Ishinas.

Lyn Sha and Pay Min teleported back at the same time. Seeing Pay Min's high-spirited appearance, Lin Sha nodded affirmatively. Keep up the good work. The battle continued. After several matches where neither side gained an advantage, a series of clashes between weak opponents from Japan and Liao.

Perhaps the words spoken earlier came true for the next two to take the stage were none other than Tu Shawn by Chien X Yasuo the swift sword saint and Ashina Ishin. A duel between two sword saints. Yasuo, are we going to admit defeat? Suddenly summoned to the battlefield, Tu Shawn by Chien felt a sense of fear. Although I know you are strong, the one on the other side seems to be even stronger. Just admit defeat and I will apologize to the city lord in person. I don't want you to leave like this. Tu Shan by Chin could finish speaking.

Yasua interrupted her. Death is like the wind, always by my side. Yasuo slowly drew his long sword. his entire being as sharp and unshathed as a sword. Even if it means death, I will not give up my duel with a master swordsman.

My mind is made up. This is a swordsman's honor. Well said. Across from him, Ishin Ashina praised. He bowed solemnly to Yasuo.

I will grant you a glorious death. The two slowly approached each other like two cowboys dueling in the wilderness, facing off, waiting for the moment to draw their guns and deliver a fatal blow to their opponent. The atmosphere grew increasingly tense. Ishin Asha said slowly, "Your lord has become hesitant and you desire a battle. Your hearts are not together which has already caused you to hesitate.

So what if I hesitate? My fate is in my own hands, not in the heavens." Their eyes met and sparks flew in the air. Take this, the two shouted at the same time. A flash of sword light. Ishin Ashina sheathed his sword. He hesitating.

Hesitation leads to defeat. Chapter 199. The stunning Valkyrie. Yasua lost. Moreover, he was killed by Ishin Ashina with a single sword strike.

The second round of elimination matches ended quickly.

Yoshi Yamamoto Isuroku burst into laughter. The battle continued and Ding Lays swordsman Misaro encountered an epic hero from Japan. Her long hair cascaded down. Her beautiful eyes were clear as water.

Her purple dress was as beautiful as a flower, and her long sword was as white as snow. She was indescribably beautiful, elegant, noble, and extraordinary. This is the number one player in the Lone Non newbie zone this year, someone exclaimed. A being capable of overpowering Lynn, Sha must be incredibly strong, right? Her hero, Melia, is just as charismatic. On the battlefield, a tall redhaired woman stood proudly alone, wearing golden armor and a scarlet cloak behind her.

She wore a golden winged helmet, the mask of which covered half of her face, revealing only her fair, flawless lower half, and bright but aloof red lips. Her right hand was a prosthetic arm made of golden armor with a long narrow sword attached to one end. This look made everyone slow their breathing and couldn't help but take a few more glances. I didn't pay attention in the previous battles, but Marenia looks really cool in her armor this time. By the way, how did Dugu Jaon's heroes perform in the previous battles? We won easily, but our opponents were all weaklings.

Indeed, there are only two possibilities in the knockout stage. Weak against weak and strong against weak. But the strength or weakness here is relative. For a hero with an S-rank talent skill or a combat power rating of 10,000 stars, an enemy with an A- rank talent of 5,000 stars is a weakling. So you understand now, right? If the god system determines that the difference in strength between the two sides is too great and one side has almost no chance to challenge the other, then they will be placed in the same elimination route.

I see. Everyone nodded. It felt quite good to have a knowledgeable old devil chief lord by their side. No wonder Sakura Shichiro's expression was so strange just now. He was also wondering who the weakling was.

As everyone was talking, the battle officially began. With a flash of smoke, Miyamoto Mousashi suddenly appeared silently behind Marlene, wielding a short Japanese sword in one hand and a shuriken in the other, attacking the heroine. The heroine remained standing motionless. "Got it," Sakura Shiro's mind. "Oh!" a cold, mocking voice rang out.

You're nothing but a stepping stone for me to get into the top 16. I will definitely kill you. Whoosh! Miamoto Mousashi's hands moved swiftly, throwing darts, shuriken, and poison bullets one after another at the heroine. Marlenia was agile and kept dodging. Those dazzling array of hidden weapons and attacks couldn't even touch Marlinia's fluttering cloak.

Marinia kept looking at the ninja opposite her with a faint mocking gaze. Miiamoto Mousashi's movements became faster and faster, but the heroine's evasion was as graceful and free as a leaf falling in a strong wind. Everyone stared intently at the battle scene. Is it a clash of titans or an elimination tournament where the strong are weak? Between these two legendary heroes, who is stronger and who is weaker? Suddenly, Marinia paused, then made a lightning fast lunge to the side. First with a shoulder strike, then with a backhand slash using her prosthetic right hand.

The collision struck Miiamoto Mousashi, who had suddenly teleported to that location. The ninja didn't even have time to react before his bones were broken. Before the sound of bones breaking could even be heard, Marlinia's swift blade had already struck down. A long, narrow blade, even taller than Marlene, sliced through Miyamoto Mousashi's body. The ninja stared in disbelief at the bottomless wound on his chest.

His eyes rolled back and he collapsed with a thud. Have you fully realized how big the gap is between you and me? Marinia casually flicked her long sword and turned to leave. Miiamoto Mousashi fallen in battle. Dugu, Jaolon, and Marlinia, who were calm and collected, were teleported back. The people in the live stream remained silent for a full 3 seconds.

Actually, the golden legendary rank is also divided into grades, but you started the heroic arena not long after you arrived, so you may not know about it. This classification is the commonly accepted term in the official area, but no one has ever heard the main god system mention it. Lin Dao, who joined a year earlier, explained, "The quality of the golden legendary also has five levels: low, medium, advanced, high, and perfect. The differences between these five levels are quite significant.

It's somewhat like it's a bit like the difference between the top student in the best class of the school and an ordinary student, even though they both got into the best key high school. Lyn Sha walked over and answered, "Yes, yes." Lyn Sha described it very vividly. This is the chasm-like gap between the five social classes. It would be more vivid to use the difference between an ordinary student from Peaking University and Wei Shun as an example. Lyn Sha thought to himself, "It is said that the perfect grade golden legendary quality is no less powerful than the mythical quality whose existence is uncertain." Lynn Douching continued to explain.

Therefore, if it's a matter of crossing several social classes, it's not surprising that Marlinia could crush Miiamoto Mousashi. Lia's side. Only the following pairs made it into the top 16. Lin Shiao and Pay Min, Dugu Xiaolan and Marlinia, Chufinga and Olaf, Lin Daoing and Gandalf, and Ding Lelay and Yuzurro. The martial arts arena is a duel between two opposing factions. This means that the five of them need to defeat an average of two enemies to compete for the final victory.
